妻

Значения

Жена

Мнемоника


Женщина 女 вооружена метлой (сверху), её обязанность — уборка.

heisig_chinese_memo: Ten rakes woman. your wife digs her fingernails into you and it feels like 10 rakes when she finds you ontop of another woman.
koohiiStory1: Ten rakes woman. your wife digs her fingernails into you and it feels like 10 rakes when she finds you ontop of another woman.
koohiiStory2: (I´m really not sexist, this just helps me remember the kanji): I make my WIFE do all the yard work, and as a really mean joke, I bought her TEN RAKES for her birthday this year. "Do the yardwork, WOMAN! You have TEN perfectly good RAKES to choose from!".
jp_example_words:
夫妻(ふさい): man and wife, married couple
妻(つま): wife
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: On the ground, holding a brush, is the woman you call your wife.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You're standing above your wife, trying to figure out what she's making with her brush on the ground. If you have a real wife in real life, picture her doing this right now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your wife is drawing your cyborg (さい) on the ground. Oh no... now your wife is making kissy faces at the cyborg drawing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Okay, so your wife may be in love with the cyborg monstrosity you created a while ago. This could become a problem.
Ru_Notes: Когда выступает фонетиком, также читается как セイ.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) you give one (一) slashed yo (肀) for is your wife
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Ten rakes woman. your wife digs her fingernails into you and it feels like 10 rakes when she finds you ontop of another woman.
origin_of_ch_char_book: As mentioned before, (女, nü, woman; daughter) depicts a young woman sitting on her knees and holding her hands together politely. When she grows up, she becomes a man’s wife. The difference between the unmarried young woman and the married woman is the hairstyle. (妻, qi=ch’i, wife) depicts a woman who is sitting on her knees with her hair held by a hand . In the past, when a woman got married, she raised her hair up in a pigtail and fixed it with a rod-like hairpin. Thus this character means a ‘married woman’ or a ‘wife’.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscription from " again " from a long-haired woman (long hair is represented by ◎), which means that a woman's long hair is grasped by hand. The ancient plundered woman is used as a wife (Chen Weizhan). The word " wife " reflects the marriage custom. The original meaning is wife, when used as a verb, it means to marry. It is said that an elephant woman can bind her hair with her hands and be a wife (Li Xiaoding). Later, " again " (hand shape) was written together with the hair. "Said the text": "Wife, the wife and the husband are the same. Cong Nu Cong 屮 Cong You, you, holding things, wife's position also. 𡜈, the ancient Chinese Wife from 𡭙, female. 𡭙, the ancient Chinese word is expensive."

Jia Jin inscription means wife, "Compilation" 938: "㞢 (侑) Yu Shiren's wife dagger (妣) Geng", which means a sacrifice to Shiren's wife Yugeng. Uncle Fu Gui: "His wife uses her to test her (filial piety) in Diao (uncle) Pi father", which means that his wife and children will feast and honor her uncle. Jin Wen also said to marry a farmer: "The official (an official) Jueyou is a wife and a farmer." " Nong " is a person's name, meaning that his friend marries his daughter to a farmer (Liu Xinyuan, Yang Shuda). "The Analects. "Gong Ye Chang": "With his sons and wives", Xing Bingshu: "A wife is a wife to a woman"

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period represent the wife, "Guodianjian. "Six Virtues" Jane 28: "The same is true for a wife." "Guodian Jane. "Six Virtues" Jane 29: "For Kundi's wife, not for his wife." "Jiudian Chujian" Tomb No. 56 slip 13: "Let's take (marry) a wife". "Shangbo Bamboo Book Five. "Gucheng Family Father" Jane 9: "With Qi (its) wife and Qi (its) mother". "Tsinghua Jane II. "The Year" Jane 5: "The King Zhou You took (married) his wife in Xishen, the king of life." Jane 23: "Cai Aihou takes (marries) his wife in Chen". Also said to marry a daughter, "Tsinghua Jane Two. "Lian Nian" Jane 35: "Hui Gongan (Yan) regards his son Huai Gong as his hold (substance) in Qin, and Qin Mu Gong regards Qi (its) son's wife as his wife." And pass false as " fine ", "Guodian Jian. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 18: "Dao is always (constant) dead (no name), servant (Piao) only (though) wife (fine), heaven and earth are always unnamed," meaning that Tao is always nameless, " Pu " (also Refers to " Tao ") Although it is small, there is no such thing as (Liu Zhao) in the world.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The word " wife " in Jiajin inscription means grasping a woman's long hair by hand, reflecting the custom of robbing marriage. The original meaning is wife extended to marry.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「又」從長髮女子(長髮以◎表示)，表示用手抓住一個女人的長髮，上古掠奪女子作為妻子(陳煒湛)，「妻」的字形反映搶婚的習俗。本義是妻子，用作動詞時，義為嫁給。一說象女子用手束髮，可為人妻(李孝定）。後來「又」(手形)與頭髮合寫在一起。《說文》：「妻，婦與夫齊者也。从女从屮从又，又，持事，妻職也。𡜈，古文妻从𡭙、女。𡭙，古文貴字。」

　　甲金文表示妻子，《合集》938：「㞢(侑)于示壬妻匕(妣)庚」，意謂對示壬的妻子妣庚進行侑祭。叔皮父簋：「其妻子用亯(享)考(孝)于弔(叔)皮父」，表示他的妻子和兒女宴饗和孝敬叔皮父。金文又表示嫁，農卣：「吏(使)厥友妻農」，「農」是人名，意謂使他的朋友把女兒嫁給農(劉心源、楊樹達)。《論語．公冶長》：「以其子妻之」，邢昺疏：「納女於人曰妻」。

　　戰國竹簡表示妻子，《郭店簡．六德》簡28：「為妻亦然」。《郭店簡．六德》簡29：「為昆弟絕妻，不為妻絕昆弟。」《九店楚簡》56號墓簡13：「利以取(娶)妻」。《上博竹書五．姑成家父》簡9：「與亓(其)妻與亓(其)母」。《清華簡二．繫年》簡5：「周幽王取(娶)妻于西申，生平王。」《清華簡二．繫年》簡23：「蔡哀侯取(娶)妻於陳」。又表示嫁女，《清華簡二．繫年》簡35：「惠公安(焉)以其子懷公爲執(質)于秦，秦穆公以亓(其)子妻之。」又通假為「細」，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡18：「道亙(恒)亡(無)名，僕(樸)唯(雖)妻(細)，天地弗敢臣」，意謂道永遠是無名的，「樸」(亦指「道」)雖然小，天下卻沒有可以役使它的(劉釗)。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文「妻」字表示用手抓住女人的長髮，反映搶婚的習俗。本義是妻子引申為嫁給。

妻字的基本解释

妻
qī
男子的配偶：妻子。妻室（指妻子）。妻小（妻子和儿女）。妻离子散。
夫

妻
qì
以女嫁人。
夫

妻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
［《廣韻》七稽切，平齊，清。］
(1)旧指男子的嫡配。
(2)今泛指男子的合法配偶。
(3)周代宫中女御。
[②]［qì］
［《廣韻》七計切，去霽，清。］
(1)嫁给。
(2)谓娶为配偶。
(3)谓奸淫。

妻字的英文翻译

◎ 妻
feme, frow, wife

妻字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页257第30
〔古文〕??【廣韻】七稽切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】千西切，?音凄。【說文】妻，與己齊者也。【詩·邶風】士如歸妻，迨冰未泮。　又令妻，令善之妻。【詩·魯頌】令妻壽母。　又妻曰鄕里。【南史·張彪傳】呼妻曰：我不忍令鄕里落他處。【姚寬曰】猶會稽人言家里。　又【梵書·蓮經註】佛有妻，名耶須。　又【集韻】千咨切，恣平聲。義同。　又七計切，音砌。以女嫁人曰妻之。【論語】以其子妻之。一曰妻者，判合也。夫者，天也。故於字夫正而妻偏。

妻字的源字形

妻字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
["Guangyun" seven cuts, level, and clear. ]
(1) Old refers to the male's direct marriage.
(2) Today generally refers to the legal spouse of a man.
(3) The female imperial palace in Zhou Dynasty.
[②]［qì］
["Guangyun" Seven Strategies Cut, Go Ji, Qing. ]
(1) Marry.
(2) It means to marry as a spouse.
(3) Refers to adultery.
wife

The same meaning.　 Seven more cuts, the sound is built. To marry a woman is a wife. [The Analects] Based on his son and wife. The one who says his wife will be judged together. Husband, heaven. Therefore, in the word, the husband is right while the wife is partial.

Жена q
Длинные волосы женщины могут касаться только ее мужа, поэтому Oracle использует этот сценарий, чтобы выразить понятие «жена».
Однако это также можно объяснить древними обычаями похищения брака.
«Сказал Вэнь»: «Жена, жена и муж тоже вместе» «Книга песен»: «Как насчет того, чтобы взять (жениться) на жену? Бандиты (не) бесподобные».

妻

Значения

Жена

Мнемоника


Женщина 女 вооружена метлой (сверху), её обязанность — уборка.

Radicals: 一, 聿, 女  (ground, brush, woman)
Meaning Mnemonic
On the ground, holding a brush, is the woman you call your wife.
You're standing above your wife, trying to figure out what she's making with her brush on the ground. If you have a real wife in real life, picture her doing this right now.
Reading Mnemonic
Your wife is drawing your cyborg (さい) on the ground. Oh no... now your wife is making kissy faces at the cyborg drawing.
Okay, so your wife may be in love with the cyborg monstrosity you created a while ago. This could become a problem.
